ygData.subject: Re: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The heads are nodrop now - sometimes people well allow you to pay for the priveledge of letting you loot Zarchoomi s corpse or whatever though. Daleia
ygData.messageBody:
>as far as banded is concerned, if you want a blackened crown, i got
>one from the doing the ogre head quest in kaladim first shot, i had bought
>one head for 7pp and a friend got me the second one, it pays to help out
>lower level friends sometimes as they hunt these zones and see whats being
>given away/sold in them hehe (Cornflunk and Zarchoomi).

The heads are nodrop now - sometimes people well allow you to pay for the
priveledge of letting you loot Zarchoomi's corpse or whatever though.

Daleia d'Allaney
